name: Imaginary unit
description: Definition of the imaginary unit; foundation of complex numbers

description: Vertices minus edges plus faces equals 2 for convex polyhedra; topological invariant

description: Classical wave equation; describes strings, sound, light

description: Diffusion of heat; parabolic PDE

description: Decomposes signal into frequencies; foundation of signal processing

description: Representation of periodic functions as sum of sinusoids

description: Newton's second law for fluid flow; millennium problem

name: Second law of thermodynamics (inequality)
description: Entropy of an isolated system never decreases

description: Evolution of the wave function in quantum mechanics

description: Information content of a random variable; foundation of information theory

name: Logistic map (chaos)
description: Simple map exhibiting deterministic chaos; Ian Stewart's 17 equations

name: Black-Scholes equation
formula: $\frac{\partial V}{\partial t} + \frac{1}{2}\sigma^2 S^2 \frac{\partial^2 V}{\partial S^2} + rS\frac{\partial V}{\partial S} - rV = 0$
description: PDE for option pricing; financial derivatives
subject: Math

name: Einstein field equations
description: General relativity; spacetime curvature from matter and energy
subject: Physics

name: Dirac equation
description: Relativistic quantum wave equation for spin-1/2 particles; predicted antimatter
subject: Physics

name: Maxwell-Ampère law (integral)
description: Ampère's law with displacement current
subject: Physics

name: Logarithm (product) — Stewart's 17
description: Ian Stewart: multiply by adding; led to slide rules and more

name: Golden ratio
description: Golden ratio; appears in geometry and nature

description: Equation of motion from Lagrangian mechanics

name: Hamilton's equations
description: Canonical equations of classical mechanics

description: Statistical mechanics; entropy and microstates

name: Continuity equation (charge)
description: Conservation of electric charge

name: Pauli exclusion principle (form)
description: No two identical fermions in same quantum state

name: Commutator (quantum)
description: Quantum mechanical commutator

description: Central in number theory and Riemann hypothesis

description: Asymptotic density of primes

description: Fundamental inequality in inner product spaces
